FrageText.de: Wo werden Sie mit einem mehrspurigen Fahrzeug die Fahrspur wählen?
FrageText.en: Which path would you take in a multi-track vehicle?
FrageText.hr: Kuda ćete vozilom s više tragova odabrati položaj na prometnoj traci tijekom vožnje?
FrageText.sl: Kje boste z večslednim vozilom izbrali vozni pas?
FrageText.tr: Burada çok izli bir araçla yolun neresinden gidersiniz?

en.Text: To the right of the grooves in the lane
To the left of the grooves in the lane
Between the grooves in the lane
In the grooves in the lane
